articles.title: This terrifying 'dragon' was Australia's largest flying reptile - CNN
articles.description: Scientists have discovered that a terrifying "dragon" once flew over Australia 105 million years ago, according to new research. The fossil of a pterosaur with a nearly 30-foot (7-meter) wingspan belonged to Australia's largest flying reptile.
